listitem.simpara: Debian packages have been updated to Debian Stretch (45642, 45709).

The packages univention-ldap, univention-directory-notifier, univention-bind, univention-heimdal, univention-postgresql and univention-appcenter now use the command service instead of invoke-rc.d to restart services. This is necessary for the services to be restarted during the UCS installation (45905, 46055).
XS-Python-Version and XB-Python-Version have been removed from all packages(43336).
The packages related to the DVD build process had to be updates to work with Debian Stretch (45868).
A typing error in the welcome screen has been corrected (45819).
The &ucsUCRV; interfaces/primary is set during the system setup (45956).

The update is stopped in case the system has a TLS certificate with a MD5 signature (46133). The hash algorithm can be set on the &ucsMaster; with ucr set ssl/default/hashfunction=sha256. The certificate needs to be renewed afterwards. For details see Renewing the SSL certificate.
OpenLDAP has been updated to version 2.4.45 (44834).
The krb5-kdc.schema has a new attribute krb5ExtendedAttributes (45996).
The test in the slapd's update scripts, whether the system is a UCS system, has been changed (45936).

Starting with UCS 4.3 the openldap overlay module for reverse group membership maintenance (memberOf) is activated by default for new installations, see the openldap documentation https://www.openldap.org/doc/admin24/overlays.html#Reverse Group Membership Maintenance for more information. This applies for new installations only, during the update to 4.3 the memberOf overlay module is installed but deactivated (if not already activated). Information on how to activate the memberOf overlay module can be found in https://help.univention.com/t/6439 (46066).

For the update of Debian Heimdal to version 7.1, the &ucsUCR; Template for /etc/krb5.conf has been adjusted to also set Heimdal specific options like default_etypes>. This ensures compatibility with domain controllers in the UCS domain that have not been updated to UCS 4.3 yet (36542, 46292).
The bind9 init script restarts the service only if the &ucsUCRV; dns/backend is set (45341).
The package univention-web now depends on univention-apache (45893).
A module for easier configuration of portal and portal entry objects has been added to the UMC. Additionally portals can now be edited directly on the portal site itself (46270).
The visibility of individual portal entries may now be restricted to logged in users of a specific group (46336, 46376).

In certain situations after reloading the browser window the error message "There are no modules available for the currently authenticated user" was incorrectly displayed. The behavior has been repaired (44068).
Non-Docker Apps are installed with a new functions. These functions support a wider range of integration (40064).
Packages are now installed via apt-get directly, instead of using a library and implement the functionality (43660).
The file /var/log/univention/appcenter.log is now rotated (46274).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The UDM users/user options have been simplified by removing posix, samba, kerberos, mail and person. All objects handled by this UDM module will now have all object classes of these options. After the upgrade to UCS 4.3 all existing user objects, groups and user templates are migrated into the new LDAP format. It is necessary that the primary group of every user has the samba option enabled and the domain must have a Kerberos realm defined. The two previous options ldap_pwd and person are now handled as separate object types: A new UDM object type users/ldap has been added which can be used as a simple authentication account. User objects which had only the ldap_pwd option enabled are migrated into users/ldap objects. The UDM option ldap_pwd has been removed from user objects. Objects of users/ldap may authenticate via an LDAP bind. A new UDM object type users/contact has been added for address book objects. User objects which had only the person option enabled are migrated into users/contact objects. Objects of type users/contact and users/ldap are not counted into the license. Note: UCS systems which are older than UCS 4.3-0 may still create user objects in the old format and must be migrated. The UMC module System diagnosis and the script /usr/share/univention-directory-manager-tools/univention-migrate-users-to-ucs4.3 can be used to detect necessary changes and migrate user objects. (45842, 46261).

The disabled and locked choices in the users/user module have been simplified and adjusted to match Active Directory concepts. Now, when an administrator disables and account, all methods for authentication get disabled (LDAP/POSIX, Kerberos, Samba). This is in line with the unification of UDM options for user accounts. The locked setting, which used to do similar things, has been replaced to show if an account has been locked out temporarily and to allow administrative unlocking. Temporary lockout of an account can happen in case a user exceeds a number of failed authentication attempts, if a corresponding domain wide policy setting has been defined by an administrator (39817).
The values for the syntax class Country have been updated (45926).
The syntax class Base64Bzip2XML has been adjusted to allow text/xml input data (45941).
In certain situations after locking and unlocking a user object the password was accidentally modified to one of password, ********, {KINIT} or {SASL}. This problem has been corrected (45877, 45879).
The robustness of the LDAP directory module has been improved: Corrupt objects will simply be ignored in the listing (46193).
The pwdChangeNextLogin user attribute toggled when a password was modified twice (46067).
The system user account ucs-sso will not consume a user license (46385).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The script startxwithfirefox now starts services in a change root environment during the installation (45895).
During the setup apache2 certificates are created in the directory /var/cache/univention-system-setup due to the PrivateTmp default setting of the apache2 systemd service (46052).
It is now ensured that the univention-directory-listener is properly restarted during the join process (46276).
Various fixes for more reliable diagnostic results (46231).
The module has been adjusted to the new API of python-psutil (45927).
The module's search query produces better results (33198).
Empty categories are now hidden in the module's search field (29733).
A warning has been added in the system services UMC module when stopping the service causes a interruption of the connection (26477).

MySQL has been replaced with MariaDB. The package univention-mysql will now install a MariaDB server on UCS 4.3. The change is transparent, if the package univention-mysql was installed on UCS 4.2, MariaDB will be installed during the update (45876, 46434, 46435).
A systemd script for the univention-saml instance of memcached has been added (45960).
The univention-saml configuration for stunnel4 has been adapted to Debian Stretch (45882).
Dependencies for the univention-saml have been adapted for php7.0 compatibility (46110).

Nagios has been updated to version 4.3.4 (45942). In this new version the default configuration directory has changed from /etc/nagios3/ to /etc/nagios/. Also the cache and log directories have been renamed to /var/cache/nagios/ and /var/log/nagios/. During the update all files from /etc/nagios3/conf.local.d/ and /etc/nagios3/conf.univention.d/ and the log and cache files are moved to the new directories to ensure a smooth transition. Nevertheless the Nagios configuration should be manually checked after the update (nagios -v /etc/nagios/nagios.cfg).
Permissions for the nagios.log have been changed to 640 (46306).
The package univention-apache now depends on apache2 (45893).
The mpm_prefork handling and &ucsUCR; templates in univention-apache has been adapted to Debian Stretch (45857, 46065).
The &ucsUCRV; apache2/ssl/v3 has been removed (45922).

The php dependencies have been removed from the univention-apache package. Also the &ucsUCRV;s php/memory/limit, php/limit/postsize, php/limit/filesize, php/limit/inputtime, php/memory/executiontime and php/limit/sockettimeout to configure the php.ini have been removed. To configure PHP settings /etc/php/7.0/apache2/php.ini or /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini can be modified manually (46121).

The package univention-mail-dovecot has updated the configuration files of Dovecot to match those of upstream version 2.2.27 (45966). User interaction is only needed if a local configuration has touched the following configuration keys:
The configuration key sieve_dir has been removed, as it is now part of the configuration value of sieve (see conf.d/90-sieve.conf).
The configuration key sieve_global_dir has been renamed to sieve_global (see conf.d/90-sieve.conf).
Dovecot does not support SSLv2 anymore.
The package univention-mail-postfix has updated the configuration files and start script of Postfix to match those of upstream version 3.1.6 (45963).

The format of the configuration file /etc/postfix/dynamicmaps.cf has changed in Postfix 3. The file will be saved to /etc/postfix/dynamicmaps.cf.postfix2.XXXXXXXX (with XXXXXXXX being a random string) and removed before upgrading. The Postfix 3 packages will recreate it in the new format during the upgrade to UCS 4.3 (45968).
The package univention-antivir-mail has updated the configuration files of ClamAV to match those of upstream version 0.99.2 (45969).

The Squid proxy server has been updated to version 3.5.23. During this update all configuration files are moved from /etc/squid3 to /etc/squid. This includes the &ucsUCRV; template /etc/squid/squid.conf but also user configurations like /etc/squid/local.conf, /etc/squid/local_rules.conf etc.. All old configuration files are saved before the update in the directory /etc/squid3-update-4.3 (45935).

Qemu has been re-compiled to use newer libraries from UCS-4.3. Profiles for Windows Server 2003 are no longer created. Individual profiles for previous UCS releases are no longer created in favor of a generic profile for UCS-4. The default boot order has been swapped to hard-disk before CD-ROM.
Samba has been updated to version 4.7.5 (45326). The UCS firewall has been adjusted to also ACCEPT port 49152. For details see Samba 4.7 Features added/changed.
The Active Directory builtin account Console Logon is created now in OpenLDAP too (46107).

Support for NT style domain control has been removed in most parts. The update for these domains is blocked and the domain needs to be migrated to Samba/AD following the update guide Migration from Samba 3 to Samba 4. See also Best practices for Samba 4 Migration (46118).
A timeout in AD-Takeover has been increased and samba_dnsupdate is run during the takeover (46105).
The S4-Connector now synchronizes the account lockout state (32014).
The following packages have been added to the maintained section of the software repository: python-winrm (45783)
The dependency of univention-java has been changed from openjdk-7-jre and icedtea-7-plugin to default-jre and icedtea-plugin (45959).
The list of available PPD printer driver has been updated in univention-printserver. No longer available drivers are marked as deprecated (45958).

OpenSSH has been updated from version 6.7 to 7.4 containing backward incompatible changes: The old SSH v.1 protocol has been removed. Many legacy algorithms have been disabled, as they are considered cryptographically weak nowadays. The &ucsUCR; template file for openssh has been updated accordingly: The deprecated &ucsUCRV;s sshd/Protocol and sshd/ServerKeyBits have been removed. The privilege separation mode has been changed to the new default sandbox. All other settings have been reviewed and reset to their default value if appropriate (46033).
Package dependencies have been updated in univention-kde (45943).
The univention-runit configuration has been adapted to Debian Stretch (45861).

To prevent systemctl from reporting a wrong status for the services univention-bind, univention-dhcp, univention-directory-notifier and univention-directory-listener, the runsv timeout has been increased to 30 seconds (46310, 46311, 46312, 46313).
The univention-directory-listener is now properly re-started in univention-directory-replication-resync (46372).
The ntp init script has been removed from univention-base-files. Instead the systemd script provided by ntp is being used (46071).
The package univention-bacula has been updates to the new versions of Bacula and PostgreSQL-9.6 from Debian. Support for old version of PostgreSQL has been removed (46327).
GRUB has been updated to a new version. Support for para-virtualized Xen domains has been removed. The SHIM binary has been renamed to follow the upstream naming schema.
The at daemon child processes are no longer terminated during the release upgrade (46388).
